original: srid pa ma mo sgang shar gyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bde chen rang sgra bzhugs so //
analyzed: srid ba ma mo sgang char gyi brgyud ba gsol debs bde chen rang sgra bzhugs so

original: bde chen dbyings kyi spyi dpal mngon rdzogs rgyal //
analyzed: bde chen dbyings kyi spyi dpal mngon rdzogs rgyal

original: 'khor 'das klong chub srid pa bde 'gro yum //
analyzed: khor da klong chub srid ba bde gro yum

original: gsang bdag rdor sems lha mo yid 'ong ma //
analyzed: gsang bdag rdar sems lha mo yid ng ma

original: mdzes ldan grub ldan rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: mdzes ldan grub ldan rnams la gsol ba debs

original: grags ldan mchog skyong d+ha na samskr-ita //
analyzed: grags ldan mchog skyong d+ha na samskr-ita

original: mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs rje pad+ma thod phreng rtshal //
analyzed: mkha gro tshhogs rje pad+ma thod phreng rtshal

original: ye shes mtshho rgyal 'brog mi dpal ye shes //
analyzed: ye shes mtshho rgyal brog mi dpal ye shes

original: ra shag chos 'bar zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: ra shag chos bar zhabs la gsol ba debs

original: rdo rje dbang phyug gu rub lo tsha ba //
analyzed: rdo rje dbang phyug gu rub lo tsha ba

original: nyi ma seng ge jo sras rtshing po dang // g.yu thog mgon po gnubs ston lha rje dar //
analyzed: nyi ma seng ge jo sras rtshing po dang g.yu thogs mgon po gnubs ston lha rje dar

original: d+harma ra dza rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: d+harma ra dza rnams la gsol ba debs

original: ye shes gzungs dang mes ston yab sras gnyis //
analyzed: ye shes gzungs dang mes ston yab sras gnyis

original: thang ston jo yes rdor seng rtsha brgyad pa //
analyzed: thang ston jo yes rdar seng rtsha brgyad ba

original: chos dpal bzang po pan chen blo gros bzang //
analyzed: chos dpal bzang po pan chen blo gros bzang

original: spa ston nam rin rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: spa ston nam rin rnams la gsol ba debs

original: gar dbang zhig gling bla chen sog zlog pa //
analyzed: gar dbang jig gling bla chen sog zlog ba

original: gzhan phan rdo rje phrin las lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: gzhan phan rdo rje phrin las lhun gyis grub

original: gter bdag gling pa rin chen rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: gter bdag gling ba rin chen rnam ba rgyal

original: mang thos 'gyur med rdo rjer gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: mang thos gyur med rdo rjer gsol ba debs

original: spang ston kun bzang pad+ma tshhe dbang rtshal //
analyzed: spong ston kun bzang pad+ma tshhe dbang rtshal

original: sgrol ston 'jam dbyangs chos kyi rgyal mtshhan 'dzin //
analyzed: sgrol ston jam dbyangs chos kyi rgyal mtshhan dzin

original: bka' babs bdun ldan 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtshe'i dbang //
analyzed: bka bab bdun ldan jam dbyangs mkhyen brtshe dbang

original: rtsha brgyud bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: rtsha brgyud bla ma rnams la gsol ba debs

original: rtag rgyal yum chen rnam lnga chos sku'i mkha'//
analyzed: rtag rgyal yum chen rnam lnga chos sku

original: ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi longs sku'i klong //
analyzed: ye shes rje mo chu bzhi longs sku klong

original: dman mo lnga bcu rtsha brgyad sprul sku'i rtshal //
analyzed: dman mo lnga chu rtsha brgyad sprul sku rtshal

original: srid pa ma rgyud lha la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: srid ba ma brgyud lha la gsol ba debs

original: dbang dang rim gnyis las skyes shes rab kyis //
analyzed: dbang dang rim gnyis las skye shes rab kyis

original: gzung 'dzin mtshhan ma ma spangs dbyings su dag
analyzed: gzung dzin mtshhan ma ma spong dbyings su dag

original: /rang byung lta ba mkha' dang klong dgu po //
analyzed: byung lta ba mkha dang klong dgu po

original: dbyer med ye shes gtan la pheb par shog
analyzed: dbyer med ye shes gtan la phebs ba shog

original: /rang bzhin gzhi dang lam gyi dkyil 'khor gsum //
analyzed: bzhin gzhi dang lam gyi dkyil khor gsum

original: zung 'brel sgom pas rtog tshhogs lha skur shar //
analyzed: zung brel sgom ba rtogs tshhogs lha skur char

original: lha nyid ye shes de yang dbyings nyid du //
analyzed: lha nyid ye shes de yang dbyings nyid du

analyzed: mthar phyin lhun grub khor lor byang chub shog

analyzed: gag sna tshhogs spyod ba lta ba rtogs

analyzed: rang gsal spyod ba sgom ba tshhad la phebs

original: mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro ba 'dul //
analyzed: mthun jug thabs kyi spyod ba gro ba dul

analyzed: phrin las bzhi la mnga dbang brnyes ba shog

analyzed: mong rig dzin rnam bzhi go phen grub

original: mthar thug sku dang ye shes rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: mthar thug sku dang ye shes rnam ba lnga

original: mkha' klong dbyer med ngang du sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: mkha klong dbyer med ngang du sangs rgya nas

analyzed: khams gsum sgrol mdzad thugs rje bdag gyur cig

analyzed: ba pad+ma gar dbang rtshal gyis bgyid ba dge legs phel
